WHYME.DESCRIPTION: Why are you passionate about programming? Here you can mention key qualities such as analytical thinking, creativity, perseverance, and team spirit. A solution-oriented mindset is always an advantage.

MYSKILLS.INFOTEXT: I am motivated to continuously expand my skills and implement innovative solutions. I keep myself up to date with new technologies and current trends.

Tab1.CONTENT1: Task manager inspired by the Kanban system. Create and organize tasks via drag & drop, assign users and categories.
Tab1.CONTENT2: My code is divided into clearly structured modules (UI, services, Firebase integration) to ensure reusability. Files, variables, and classes are consistently and meaningfully named. Documentation is done directly in the code using JSDoc comments. Code quality is ensured through Prettier and version control with Git.
Tab1.CONTENT3: Our team consisted of four people. My role in this project was the development of the task components. The technologies used were HTML, CSS, and JavaScript; reading and saving data via Firebase was the central part. It was a great team and the collaboration went smoothly.

Tab1.CONTENT2: My code is divided into clear modules (HTML, CSS, Canvas rendering, JS logic) for better maintainability. Files, variables, functions, and classes are consistently and clearly named. Important functions are documented with JSDoc. Complex logic is annotated with short comments. Git is used for version control and clean commit structure.
Tab1.CONTENT3: I really enjoyed working on this project because I was able to deepen my knowledge in HTML, CSS, Canvas, and JavaScript. Working with the Canvas API for drawings, animations, and interactive elements was particularly exciting.

Tab1.CONTENT1: Using JavaScript, I fetched data from a Pokémon API and processed it as JSON. The results were then displayed dynamically in the browser.
Tab1.CONTENT2: First, I created the HTML structure and designed the layout with CSS. Then I built the logic with modular JavaScript. Finally, I implemented API fetching and data handling for dynamic content display.
Tab1.CONTENT3: I really enjoyed this project because I was able to deepen my knowledge in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Retrieving and processing data from web APIs was particularly interesting.

TEAMPLAYER.HEADLINE1: Are you looking for a team player?
TEAMPLAYER.HEADLINE2: This is what my colleagues say about me

PLAYER.DESCRIPTION: "Christian was a great support in the team. He is very helpful, always patient, and absolutely reliable. His structured way of working often moved us forward – simply someone who makes collaboration pleasant and productive."

"Christian proved to be a highly competent and dedicated team member. He thinks independently, contributes his own ideas, and works very reliably. His clear and open communication made our collaboration effective and pleasant. His friendly and humorous nature greatly contributed to a positive team atmosphere."

"I had the pleasure of working with Christian on a web development project. He impressed with technical knowledge, clear structure, and solution-oriented thinking. His communication skills and team spirit made the project efficient and successful. Highly recommended!"

CONTACT.HEADLINE: Contact me
CONTACT.DESCRIPTION: Feel free to contact me if you have a job offer or an opportunity where I can contribute my expertise as an electrical master craftsman and programmer. I am particularly interested in areas such as IoT, embedded systems, smart home technologies, and modern web development (Angular, SCSS, Firebase).
CONTACT.PRIVACYPOLICY_NOTICE3: and agree to the processing of my data as described.
